messages.title: For a strong, experienced and principled MP
messages.content: After this election we'll either have a Conservative government led by a good strong leader, or Jeremy Corbyn and John McDonnell propped up by Nicola Sturgeon. Winchester is at real risk of having a Labour convert. This election is about the kind of MP who represents us. It is my strong desire to get Brexit done and to bring stability for local businesses and families.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fighting NHS closures and providing real investment in the health service.
